bapAnswer:
*Canni sneaks up behind her target and...*
:newspaper2: *BAPS* %s
bapethAnswer:
I shall vanquish thee, with mine own newspaper!
:newspaper2: *BAPETH* %s
canniBapAnswer:
:newspaper2:*Canni gives herself a good bap on the head.* 
%s Ouch! That hurt! %s
selfBapAnswer:
%s Noooooo! 
Don't bap me. I'm a good pony. %s

:newspaper2: *Canni baps %s instead*.
Teehee! I got you!
selfBapethAnswer:
%s Nay! Doth not bapeth me.
 I am a valorous pony. %s
cooldownMessage: %s It's not very nice to bap people that often, you know...
bapGuardCooldownAnswer: I better not, or Wachmann will be mad at me again...
